title: Radio Silence
description: America is under attack from zombies - and Remy King has no idea how to stop it, discovering the truth about her grandparents death while Lazlo Durante hides in his show business bunker. Elsewhere Blue Adams tries to bring help to the people and Harlow Smith learns a terrible secret about her mother! New stories leading up to Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND, adapted and enhanced by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee (X-Men Unlimited, Doctor Who), with phenomenal artwork by Steve Uy(Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified)! Dynamite Entertainment proudly presents Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland graphic novel. Amanda Hocking is the New York Times bestselling author of the Trylle trilogy and six additional self-published novels. After selling over a million copies of her books, primarily in eBook format, she is widely considered the exemplar of self-publishing success in the digital age. Hollowland is the first book in the young adult dystopian series 'The Hollows', and Amanda has personally overseen and approved this Hollowland graphic novel project. Each book in this series will be released digital-only, with the 10-issue print collection of the graphic novel to be published Q4 2013.
author: Amanda Hocking
